column4: My nvidia FX5200 give a black and white TV-Out output. How do I fix this? Please help. Been going at this for weeks. Using ubuntu 9.02

I had that problem a few times. Once, it turned out to be a defective cable and an other time I had to set it (in the config) to use s-video out instead of rca (or whatever is the other option), even if it was in fact that option...
The tv has been plugged into laptops with that cable, and color worked fine.
I also read that a cable of an outstanding lenght OR lots of noise (read interference) could also cause that kind of problem.
